query: Can you generate a 5-day travel plan for a group of 5 people? We will be departing from Harrisburg and plan to visit 2 cities in North Carolina from March 15th to March 19th, 2022. Our budget is $8,000. For transportation, we prefer anything other than a flight. Parties are part of our itinerary, therefore our accommodations should allow this. As for food, we're eager to savor Italian, American, Chinese, and Mexican cuisines.
actions: choose_city_bundle:[Charlotte,Fayetteville]
